rights fusion for issues with approval sent thursday re rights fusion hi guys approvers tab approval was showing up requested selected manually action request approval then when approved his row change into longer required guess something quite right with his role initial request for him be added for was req client manager holiday notice february sent thursday re rights fusion could please have followup if possible be added added myself based request number below but still can approve thanks sent monday re rights fusion thanks request raised req client manager holiday notice rd th february sent monday re rights fusion hi if you need have set up we longer use fusion you need raise ticket with ask be added for client you need mean you receive approval have rights approve thanks sent monday re rights fusion hi we need have follow up still reason why those rights also given thanks sent monday october re rights fusion hello longer work cannot approve request have looped client operations manager thread any changes operation need be agreed with him thanks regards sent october re rights fusion adding conversation going forward need same access levels currently have be carrying out related tasks currently cheers head digital sent october rights fusion hi how process setup but need have rights for cr approvals related work what get access fusion please thanks manager mob en

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing an IT ticket**

I need to categorize this IT ticket. The categories are "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," "Miscellaneous," "Storage," "Purchase," "Internal Project," and "Administrative rights." 

The ticket mentions various issues related to access rights and approvals, such as "rights fusion for issues with approval" and "approvers tab approval." Given that the content focuses on access rights, I think the best category is either "Access" or "Administrative rights." Both fit, but "Access" seems most appropriate.**Choosing the ticket category**

I've been considering the best category for this IT ticket. It seems to fit "Access" more generally, but "Administrative rights" is specific to admin privileges. The ticket includes terms like "rights fusion," "approvals," and "have rights approve," all related to access rights for roles.

Since the content focuses on approval rights needed to perform actions, I think the best choice is "Administrative rights." So, I’ll output the category in the required format: {"category":"Administrative rights"}.{"category":"Administrative rights"}
